FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING THE USE OF RENEWABLE ENERGY IN HOMES BY PROVIDING INCENTIVES AND CREDIT FACILITIES FOR CONSUMERS UTILIZING SMALL SOLAR POWER SYSTEMS

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2018-01-29
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-03-13
          -The Committee agreed to refer the measures to the TWG created on January 29, 2018 on the utilization of solar energy in all government offices and buildings, for a combined deliberation on the measures. The DOE was requested to submit data and information on the reduction of power demand program, comparative paper of the incentives provided under R.A. No. 9513 and those provided in the subject measures and an updated total number of households which participated in the net metering system. Presiding Chairman Carlos Roman L. Uybarreta instructed the Committee Secretariat to invite to the next hearing the ERC, MERALCO, Union of Local Authorities of the Philippines (ULAP) and other LGU groups and the PNOC-Renewable Corporation.
      3. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-09-10
